summary: The class prepares training and evaluation data for link prediction by extracting k‑hop subgraphs around each edge in a DGL graph, generating a configurable number of negative samples per positive edge, optionally subsampling the dataset, and handling multi‑edge graphs through coalescing.
business_intent: Enable efficient preprocessing of graph data for SEAL‑style link prediction models, providing balanced positive/negative samples and localized subgraph structures to improve model training and inference.
